name: Honour Among Thieves
description:
This is a competitive party game focused on stealing items from different locations and households while either avoiding or sabotaging the other player to be the first thief out.

With up to 4 maps to play through with items being randomised to each player as well as the locations of each item being placed between 3+ different locations. This adds a large quantity of replayability providing short but continuous entertainment that can be played at almost anytime.
